content.p: Assistant Professor, Dr. Chee Wing Loon completed his BSc (Hons) Mathematics and PhD from Universiti Sains Malaysia in 2007 and 2010 respectively. His PhD research work was about nonassociative algebra, in particular Moufang loops. He was then appointed as a postdoctoral research fellow in the same university from 2010 to 2012. He joined the Department of Applied Mathematics, University of Nottingham Malaysia Campus in August 2012. Foundation Algebra, Linear Algebra, Modern Algebra, Calculus, Engineering Mathematics, Differential Equations, Business Statistics Nonassociative Algebra, Loop Theory, Number Theory, Cryptography telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
